ThingDef.label: tenebral bodysuit
ThingDef.description: A full tenebral bodysuit made of tenebrite crystalline fiber. It is light and thin, but surprisingly sturdy.

ThingDef.label: tenebral modular security armor
ThingDef.description: The tenebral configuration of the Greydale modular body protection system, the "Warrior IV" security armor provides modest protection for most body parts. If you have the proper equipment, It can be reassembled into other armor.

ThingDef.label: tenebral security helmet
ThingDef.description: A tenebral helmet of the "Warrior IV" tenebral security armor. A simple and robust protection gear.

ThingDef.label: tenebral modular pioneer armor
ThingDef.description: A tenebral armor designed primarily for combat engineer, Greydale "Laconian IV" pioneer armor has integrated tool set. It's a pretty good gear for builds something while gunfight.

ThingDef.label: tenebral pioneer helmet
ThingDef.description: A helmet of the "Laconian IV" pioneer armor. A simple pain damper system integrated.

ThingDef.label: tenebral modular nomad armor
ThingDef.description: "Akicita IV", the long-range tenebral scout variant of the tenebral "Warrior IV" modular body protection system. This outfit recycles the wearer's body waste and moisture, provides heat and cold protection and sound dampening, and assists the wearer with servo motors and a lightweight exoskeleton. The wearer needs less sleep, moves faster, hunting quieter. Originally designed as a protective device for explorers, guerrillas and caravans of rimworlds soon realized the amazing potential of the equipment.

ThingDef.label: tenebral nomad helmet
ThingDef.description: A tenebral helmet of the "Akicita IV" tenebral nomad armor. Its long-range observation equipment can also be used for aiming.

ThingDef.label: tenebral modular Medic armor
ThingDef.description: Designed for combat medics, the "Hospitaller IV" tenebral armor is the medical variant of the "Warrior IV" tenebral modular body protection system. The armor is equipped with a variety of medical tools and supplies, so the wearer can treat the injured in the field.

ThingDef.label: tenebral medic helmet
ThingDef.description: A tenebral helmet of the "Hospitaller IV" tenebral Medic armor. The built-in AI medical interface assists the wearer during medical procedures.

ThingDef.label: tenebral drop suit
ThingDef.description: Yeonhwa Precision Tenebral Drop Suit model 412f, 'JanYeong(shadow remains) IV'. Built for the YeonHwa Aggresive Marketing Division's drop troops, this completely enclosed suit is designed to perform low orbit jump action. Its integrated long-ranged jump pack makes JanYeong ideal equipment for the rapid insertion mission.

ThingDef.label: tenebral dropsuit helmet
ThingDef.description: It is a state-of-the-art tenebral helmet, optimized for EVA and orbital drop operations. This helmet has lots of shiny gadgets. Of course, all of these flashing toys are useless in the surface environment except the targeting assist pseudo A.I.

ThingDef.label: tenebral strike suit
ThingDef.description: Yeonhwa Precision Strike Suit model 383a, 'ChangWol(Azure Moon) IV'. Designed for urban strike teams, this sophisticated suit have short-ranged, fast jump thrusters for rapid assault. In order to maximize the operational capacity of this suit, the wearer requires fast reaction speed and exceptional boldness.

ThingDef.label: tenebral strikesuit helmet
ThingDef.description: A tenebral helmet of the delicate tenebral strike suit. Sophisticated nerve assist system inside this helmet makes the wearer act faster.

ThingDef.label: tenebral assault armor
ThingDef.description: An Ultra-heavy tenebral protective armor, "Bjorn IV" cladded with layers of composite tenebrite-weave and reactive armor plates. The wearer of this armor is practically become a walking tank. This armor achieved tremendous protection at the expense of moving speed. It has an integrated short-range EMP grenade launcher.

ThingDef.label: tenebral assault helmet
ThingDef.description: Rugged and trustworthy tenebral helmet of the tenebral assault armor.

ThingDef.label: tenebral fire support armor
ThingDef.description: If you need a walking turret, call the "Varg IV" tenebral fire support armor. Rapid reloading system, additional ammo container, built in fire control system, everything of the "Varg IV" focused on fire support. In return, the Varg is very vulnerable to close combat.

ThingDef.label: tenebral fire support helmet
ThingDef.description: Tenebral helmet of the tenebral "Varg IV" fire support armor. Share the features with the fire support armor.

ThingDef.label: tenebral artillery armor
ThingDef.description: A tenebral variant of the "Varg IV" tenebral fire support armor, the "Korp(Raven) IV" artillery armor originated from modified makeshift equipment of frontlines. All unnecessary equipment was removed from Korp to mount a huge mortar, "Crow feeder." The purpose of this equipment is simple; turn the wearer into walking artillery. The only ammunition this mortar can shoot is high-explosive shells.

ThingDef.label: tenebral reflactor carapace
ThingDef.description: The "Nemesis IV" is a powered armor that created to hunt the Federation remnants. Almost immune to the heat energy, the Tisiphone Hunter Contingent provides this armor to their elite hunters.

ThingDef.label: tenebral reflactor helmet
ThingDef.description: A tenebral helmet with a complete set of heat deflector system.

ThingDef.label: tenebral hazard carapace
ThingDef.description: The "Alecto IV" tenebral hazard carapace is designed to carry out mission even in the worst environment. In extreme cold area, in a heat wave, and even in radioactive wasteland, Tisiphone hunters can continue their endless hunting.

ThingDef.label: tenebral hazard helmet
ThingDef.description: A tenebral helmet of an "Alecto IV" hazard carapace. This helmet provides excellent environmental protection.

ThingDef.label: tenebral close combat armor
ThingDef.description: Tenebral power armor with a built-in shield, "Excelsior IV" is a close combat focused power armor with maneuverability, durability, and lethality.

ThingDef.label: tenebral close combat helmet
ThingDef.description: Tenebral elmet of a "Excelsior IV" close combat armor. It assist wearer with neural close combat enhancement system.
